quality_assessment: Subsection is essentially empty with only a heading. Missing all content about GitHub Actions integration for automated documentation deployment.

issues.description: Subsection contains only a heading with no content. Should document how to set up GitHub Actions workflow for automated documentation deployment.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add comprehensive documentation covering: workflow setup, deployment configuration, path filters, permissions, PR validation, troubleshooting, and integration with Prodigy's book workflow system.

issues.description: No documentation on creating .github/workflows/deploy-docs.yml workflow file
issues.fix_suggestion: Document the standard workflow structure: triggers (push/PR), permissions (contents: write), jobs (build-deploy), steps (checkout, setup mdbook, build, deploy to gh-pages)

issues.description: Missing explanation of GitHub Pages deployment using peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v4
issues.fix_suggestion: Explain how the workflow deploys to gh-pages branch using peaceiris/actions-gh-pages action, including publish_dir configuration (./book/book) and github_token authentication

issues.description: No documentation about why and how to use path filters to optimize CI/CD
issues.fix_suggestion: Explain path filters (book/**, .github/workflows/deploy-docs.yml) to prevent unnecessary workflow runs and save CI minutes

issues.description: Missing explanation of pull_request trigger for validating documentation builds before merge
issues.fix_suggestion: Document how the workflow validates documentation builds on PRs (pull_request trigger) but only deploys on push to main/master branches (if: github.event_name == 'push')

issues.description: No explanation of why contents: write permission is required
issues.fix_suggestion: Explain that contents: write permission is needed for peaceiris/actions-gh-pages to push to gh-pages branch, contrasting with pages: write used by actions/deploy-pages approach

issues.description: Missing documentation of recommended action versions
issues.fix_suggestion: Document recommended versions: actions/checkout@v5, peaceiris/actions-mdbook@v2, peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v4

issues.description: No guidance on configuring GitHub Pages settings in repository
issues.fix_suggestion: Add instructions for enabling GitHub Pages: Settings → Pages → Source: Deploy from a branch → Branch: gh-pages / (root)

issues.description: Missing documentation of frequently encountered setup issues
issues.fix_suggestion: Document common mistakes from Spec 128: wrong filename (docs.yml vs deploy-docs.yml), wrong deployment action (actions/deploy-pages vs peaceiris/actions-gh-pages), missing path filters, wrong permissions, missing PR validation, deploying on PR

issues.description: No troubleshooting guide for workflow failures
issues.fix_suggestion: Add troubleshooting section covering: workflow runs on every commit, permission denied when deploying, documentation not updating, 404 error on GitHub Pages, workflow syntax error, deployment job skipped on push

issues.description: No quick start section for developers who want to deploy in < 5 minutes
issues.fix_suggestion: Add quick start with copy-paste commands: curl template workflow, commit/push, enable GitHub Pages in settings

issues.description: Missing explanation of how GitHub Actions workflow integrates with Prodigy's book documentation workflow
issues.fix_suggestion: Explain how the GitHub Actions workflow deploys the documentation generated by Prodigy's book-docs-drift.yml MapReduce workflow. Note that Prodigy generates/updates the content, while GitHub Actions handles deployment.

positive_aspects: Subsection is correctly referenced in parent chapter index
improvement_suggestions: Add visual diagram showing GitHub Actions workflow execution flow
Include complete working example of deploy-docs.yml with inline comments
Add comparison table: gh-pages branch method vs GitHub Pages Actions method
Include validation checklist aligned with Spec 127 (when implemented)
Add migration guide from other deployment approaches
Cross-reference to Understanding the Workflow subsection for worktree isolation
Link to Troubleshooting subsection for common issues

metadata.validation_focus: Check github actions integration documentation matches implementation
